name: Dream World (wangwentao43)
description:
Welcome to dream world. Brain technology is fully developed here. You can enter several amazing trips in your dream. Making your dream vocation a reality. 

Now, enter the dream capsule to start your journey.

- WASD to move

- SPACE to jump

- TAB to leave/return the body

    - SPAGE to fly 

    - LEFT CONTROL to land
